(B) Swallowing involves contraction and relaxation of at least 14 groups of muscles in about 10 seconds in healthy subjects (C) The biofilm covering tooth enamel contains several salivary and bacterial enzymes and (D) Salivary amylase digests the dextran film on tooth enamel formed from dietary sucrose. Of the answer choices above, answer (D) is the
